subject: The jack
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Just an 1/8th inch stereo jack, but it has a switch for each channel. This
radio has a seperate sweep for AM and FM, so if I want to be able to use
external sweep, or hack mode both need to be switchable. The jack switches
when the plug is in serted, and any kind of sweep can be used.

 F-S
